remarks: Transfer ~ itg2cn to the full Lebesgue integral.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)
statement:
itgcn.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgcn.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgcn.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
itgcn $p |- ( ph -> E. d e. RR+ A. u e. dom vol ( ( u C_ A /\ ( vol ` u ) < d ) -> S. u ( abs ` B ) _d x < C ) ) $.
$d A d u x $.
$d B d u $.
$d C d u $.
$d d ph u x $.
